original_text: “If anyone causes one of these little ones—those who believe in me—to stumble, it would be better for them if a large millstone were hung around their neck and they were thrown into the sea.
korean_text: 또 누구든지 나를 믿는 이 작은 자들 중 하나라도 실족하게 하면 차라리 연자맷돌이 그 목에 매여 바다에 던져지는 것이 나으리라

sentences.original_text: If anyone causes one of these little ones
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 누군가 이 어린아이 중 하나를 걸려 넘어지게 하면

sentences.original_text: it would be better for them
if a large millstone were hung around their neck
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 큰 맷돌이 그들의 목에 걸려 있고

sentences.original_text: and they were thrown into the sea
